!linea news02
25 aout. Revivifier les musees de sites du Patrimoine mondial au Cambodge, Laos et Viet Nam, UNESCO

Ce projet du fonds-en-depot japonais aupres de l'UNESCO a ete conçu comme un projet pilote pour accompagner le processus de revitalisation des musees de site du patrimoine vivant et les centres d'interpretation dedies aux sites archeologiques des trois pays.
!linea news02
Publications, publications et periodiques en ligne
5 octobre. Bulletin de l'ISPAN 28, Haiti
5 octobre. La preservation des maisons de style gingerbread d'Haiti: Rapport de mission apres le seisme de 2010, par Langenbach, Randolph, et al. World Monuments Funds
21 septembre. Gestion de colecciones, par Amelia Aguado de Costa
21 septembre. Bulletin de l'ISPAN 27, Haiti
21 septembre. Museum International No. 248, UNESCO
Haiti, patrimoine culturel et refondation
21 septembre. Twelve houses restored in Japan and Italy, par Marco Imperadori et al.
21 septembre. IFLA Newsletter No. 94, International Federation of Landscape Architects
21 septembre. Implementing the Incident Command System at the Institutional Level: A Handbook for Libraries, Archives, Museums, and Other Cultural Institutions, par David W. Charmicheal
20 septembre. Lignes directrices pour la conservation des peintures murales exterieures, par Debra Daly Hartin, Institut canadien de conservation

20 septembre. The Visible Past / Open Context Loosely Coupled Model for Digital Humanities Ubiquitous Collaboration and Publishing: Collaborating Across Print, Mobile, and Online Media, par Sorin Adam Matei, Eric Kansa, Nicholas Rauh

The paper presents a platform for supporting academic collaboration and publishing created by flexibly linking Visible Past, a web collaboration and digital-print publishing with Open Context, a geo-historical data archiving and publishing service.
20 septembre. E-Dialogos, Diadrasis
Annual digital journal on research in Conservation and Cultural Heritage.
20 septembre. Financiamento da Regeneraçao de Áreas Urbanas Patrimoniais na America Latina, par Silvio Zancheti

O livro Financiamento da Regeneraçao de Áreas Urbanas Patrimoniais na America Latina , do professor Silvio Mendes Zancheti, apresenta um quadro sistematico do processo de financiamento da regeneraçao de areas urbanas patrimoniais (centros historicos e outros tipos de areas) na America Latina no periodo 1990 - 2005.
!linea news02
Sites Internet
5 octobre. Heritage Portal

This site has been developed under the EU-funded NET-HERITAGE programme to provide a platform accessible to a wide audience of Researchers, Practitioners, Funding Agencies, Policymakers and anyone with an interest in European cultural heritage. It enables users to connect, share their knowledge and work collaboratively.
21 septembre. War Free World Heritage Listed Cities
Promoting good governance for the protection of urban heritage in times of armed conflict.
21 septembre. Smarthistory

Smarthistory.org is a free and open, not-for-profit, art history textbook. We use multimedia to deliver unscripted conversations between art historians about the history of art. We are seeking contributors -- especially for canonical non-Western material and other survey topics not yet covered.
21 septembre. Encyclopedia of Life
Global access to knowledge about life on Earth
20 septembre. Academia.edu
Academia.edu is a place to share and follow research
20 septembre.l'Archive Ouverte de l'ICOMOS
l'Archive Ouverte de l'ICOMOS : e-publications sur le patrimoine culturel, une archive mondiale specialisee dans la conservation et la restauration des monuments, sites et paysages.
